quotes.quote: Life is not lost by dying; life is lost minute by minute, day by dragging day, in all the thousand small uncaring ways.
Our time in this life is limited. And how we respect that time will create a greater possibility for fulfillment.
Let's not allow ourselves to be upset by small things we should despise and forget. Remember 'Life is too short to be little'.
Live honestly to a higher note. Life is too short. So, do the best you can and live your life to a higher note.
Men talk of killing time, while time quietly kills them.
Every day has been so short, every hour so fleeting, every minute so filled with the life I love that time for me has fled on too swift a wing.

There comes a time in your life when you have to let go of all the pointless drama and the people who create it and surround yourself with people who make you laugh so hard that you forget the bad and focus solely on the good. After all, life is too short to be anything but happy.
Life is short, break the rules, forgive quickly, kiss slowly. love truly, laugh uncontrollably, and never regret anything that makes you smile.
Live every day as if it were going to be your last; for one day you're sure to be right.
Begin doing what you want to do now. We are not living in eternity. We have only this moment, sparkling like a star in our hand--and melting like a snowflake...
The truth is you don't know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.
Enjoy every moment you have. Because in life, there are no rewinds, only flashbacks.
Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.
Life is a first impression. You get one shot at it. Make it everlasting.
Life is too short to worry about anything. You had better enjoy it because the next day promises nothing.
Enjoy life while you can. It can be taken in a heart beat.
Country people do not behave as if they think life is short; they live on the principle that it is long, and savor variations of the kind best appreciated if most days are the same.
Life is too short to cry for anything so smile and do what makes you happy with morals.
All days will pass, all moments will last, each friend will part, it's a journey too fast.
If you want something, don't wish for it. Life is too short to wait.
Life is too short, and the time we waste in yawning never can be regained.
Embrace your uniqueness. Time is much too short to be living someone else's life.
Life is short and if you're looking for extension, you had best do well. Cause there's good deeds and then there's good intentions. They are as far apart as Heaven and Hell.

We only have one life and one body to care of, and we better do it right. You never know what tomorrow may bring and so we better live this life the best we can and be grateful for everything we have.
If there's even a slight chance at getting something that will make you happy, risk it. Life's too short and happiness is too rare.
Life is transitory it doesn't last forever, but with the time that is given you can find some sort of purpose.
I think life is far too short to concentrate on your past. I rather look into the future.
Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.
We are constantly reminded about how short life is. Please try to leave your best positive impression on everyone that you meet.
Life is too short, or too long, for me to allow myself the luxury of living it so badly.
